autohud.title: Auto HUD
autohud.option.dynamicOnLoad: Включать динамический HUD при загрузке игры
autohud.group.animationSpeeds: Special animation speeds (set to 0 to use above value)
autohud.option.revealType.description:
Индивидуальное: перемещать все компоненты независимо друг от друга
Складываемое: прятать компоненты только если им не мешают другие видимые компоненты
Группой: двигать все логически сгруппированные компоненты (хотбар) вместе
Комбинированное (прятать): прятать видимые компоненты вместе
Комбинированное: двигать все компоненты вместе
autohud.option.statusEffectTimer: Отображать время действия эффекта на его иконке
autohud.option.statusEffectTimer.descrip: Show remaining time of status effects on their icon
autohud.option.mountJumpBar.active: Прятать полоску прыжка лошади, если не меняется
autohud.option.mountJumpBar.onChange: Показывать полоску прыжка лошади при изменении
autohud.option.hotbar.hotbar.onChange: Показывать, если объект в активном слоте меняется
autohud.option.hotbar.durabilityPercenta: Процент прочности, при котором будет отображение
autohud.option.hotbar.durabilityTotal: Уровень прочности, при котором будет отображение
autohud.option.hidePersistentStatusEffec: Всегда прятать статус постоянных эффектов (например, от надетого черепашьего панциря)
autohud.option.scoreboard.onTeamChange.d: Если команда является частью статистики игрока, обновлять; иначе любая команда может обновлять и при этом не предоставлять изменений
autohud.option.advanced.label:
Here you can manually adjust values for each component. This might be necessary if some other mod moves components around.
Set numeric values to -1 to inherit from default.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.autohud: Динамический HUD, элементы которого прячутся, если они не нужны.
autohud.option.dynamicOnLoad.description: Enable dynamic HUD on game load
autohud.option.ticksRevealed.description: The time in ticks that components should be revealed for. After this time, they automatically hide again.
autohud.option.animationMove.description: Enables the move animation, hiding components by pushing them off the screen.
autohud.option.animationFade.description: Enables the fade animation, hiding components by reducing their opacity.
autohud.group.animationSpeeds.descriptio: Special animation speeds Set to 0 to use above value
autohud.option.animationSpeeds.moveIn.de: Animation speed while moving in. Set to 0 to use above speed value.
autohud.option.animationSpeeds.moveOut.d: Animation speed while moving out. Set to 0 to use above speed value.
autohud.option.animationSpeeds.fadeIn.de: Animation speed while fading in. Set to 0 to use above speed value.
autohud.option.animationSpeeds.fadeOut.d: Animation speed while fading out. Set to 0 to use above speed value.
autohud.option.health.policy.description:
Always: always visible
Disabled: do not automatically reveal
Changing: reveal when health changes
Increasing: reveal when healing
Decreasing: reveal when hurting
Not Full: reveal when not at full health
Low: reveal when at low health
autohud.option.hunger.policy.description:
Always: always visible
Disabled: do not automatically reveal
Changing: reveal when hunger changes
Increasing: reveal when eating
Decreasing: reveal when gaining hunger
Not Full: reveal when not at full food bar
Low: reveal when at low food bar
autohud.option.air.policy.description:
Always: always visible
Disabled: do not automatically reveal
Changing: reveal when air changes
Increasing: reveal when gaining air
Decreasing: reveal when losing air
Not Full: reveal when not at full health
Low: reveal when at low health
autohud.option.armor.policy.description:
Always: always visible
Disabled: do not automatically reveal
Changing: reveal when armor changes
Increasing: reveal when adding armor
Decreasing: reveal when removing armor
Not Full: reveal when not at full armor bar
Low: reveal when armor bar is low
autohud.option.experience.active.descrip: Dynamically hide the experience bar. If disabled, the experience bar is always visible.
autohud.option.experience.onChange.descr: Reveal the experience bar whenever gaining experience.
autohud.option.mountJumpBar.active.descr: Hide mount jump bar when not charging
autohud.option.mountJumpBar.onChange.des: Reveal mount jump bar during charge
autohud.option.mountHealth.policy.descri:
Always: always visible
Disabled: do not automatically reveal
Changing: reveal when health changes
Increasing: reveal when healing
Decreasing: reveal when hurting
Not Full: reveal when not at full health
Low: reveal when at low health
autohud.option.hotbar.hotbar.onChange.de: Reveal whenever the active slot's content changes
autohud.option.hotbar.onSlotChange.descr: Reveal when switching the currently selected slot
autohud.option.hotbar.maximumFadeHotbarI: Fade-out limit for hotbar items. Set this to non-zero to keep the contents of the hotbar always slightly visible.
autohud.option.scoreboard.scoreboard.onC: Reveal when the scoreboard title changes
autohud.option.defaultValues.speedMultip: Speed multiplier that gets added onto the animation speed.
autohud.option.defaultValues.distance.de: Controls how many pixels elements move out by
autohud.option.defaultValues.maximumFade: Controls how far the opacity of elements can be reduced.
autohud.option.advanced.direction.descri: Which direction to move the component in. You probably want to set it to its closest screen edge.
Speed multiplier that gets added onto the animation speed. Set to -1 to use default.
autohud.option.advanced.distance.descrip: Controls how many pixels this element moves out by. Set to -1 to use default.
autohud.option.advanced.maximumFade.desc: Controls how far the opacity of this element can be reduced. Set to -1 to use default.
